config.environment_ini:
[general]
refresh_date = 2025-05-28
user = dnaomi
environment = 
mo_name = 
driver_dataset = 
dataproc_project_name = 
dataproc_storage_bucket = pypl-bkt-rsh-row-std-gds-pacman
local_output_base_path = /projects/${general:user}/bt-retry-global-v2
gcs_base_path = gs://${general:dataproc_storage_bucket}/user/${general:user}/bt_retry_refresh
queue_name = default
namespace = gds-packman
config.solution_ini:
[general]
model_name = BT_RETRY_V2_MODEL
check_point = 
email_to = ${general:user}
state_file = 
cosmos_project = ${general:user}
gcp_app_id = 

[driver_creation]
strategy_type = ['PAN', 'NO_AVS', 'NETWORK_TOKENIZATION', 'ABU']
date_range_start = 2023-08-15
date_range_end = 2025-01-02
random_sampling_factor = 15
train_downsampling_factor = 900
validation_downsampling_start = 900
validation_downsampling_end = 950
oot_downsampling_start = 950
final_train_table = pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_train_3
final_validation_table = pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_valid_3
final_test_table = pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_test_3

[driver_creation_2]
source_table_name_train = pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_train
source_table_name_valid = pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_valid
source_table_name_test = pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_test
temporary_gcs_bucket = ${general:dataproc_storage_bucket}
target_gcs_path_train = ${general:gcs_base_path}/pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_train_2
target_gcs_path_valid = ${general:gcs_base_path}/pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_valid_2
target_gcs_path_test = ${general:gcs_base_path}/pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_test_2

[model_training]
train_parquet_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/data/pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_v2_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_train_3/
val_parquet_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/data/pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_v2_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_valid_3/
v2_features_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/metadata/v2_features.txt
target_col = retry_is_success
early_stopping_params = {'stopping_rounds': 10}
early_stopping_metric = average_precision
objective_metric_name = partial_aucpr_geq90
model_artifact_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/final/bt_retry_v2.txt

[model_evaluation]
data_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/data/pypl-bods.gds_pacman_prod.bt_retry_global_refresh_driverset_cc_renamed_radd_subset_filtered_full_test_3/
v1_features_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/metadata/features_original.txt
v1_model_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/lgbm/original_lgbm/original_model.txt
v2_features_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/metadata/v2_features_final_2.txt
v2_model_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/final/bt_retry_v2.txt
target_col = retry_is_success
v1_metrics = calculated metrics for V1 model
v2_metrics = calculated metrics for V2 model
valid_data_filtered_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/deployment/valid_data_filtered_final.csv

[model_packaging]
full_features_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/metadata/v2_features_final_2.txt
model_file_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/bt_retry_v2_small.txt
model_name = bt_retry_v2
path_to_json = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/bt_retry_v2_model_idi.json
output_directory = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/ume/
model_json_with_pd_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/bt_retry_v2_model_idi.json
binary_spec_output_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/models/ume/

[model_scoring]
model_dir = /home/${general:user}/bt-retry-global-refresh/models/ume/
model_ume_name = bt_retry_v2
valid_sample_path = /home/${general:user}/bt-retry-global-refresh/deployment/valid_data_filtered_final.csv
features_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/metadata/v2_features_final_2.txt
scored_data_path = ${general:local_output_base_path}/deployment/cosmos_ai_valid_data.csv
